overview: Six years after a dark tragedy and a lifetime career fraught with danger, Bruce Wayne has retired from the field as Batman. But while Batman’s rogues’ gallery has been all but defeated years ago, an old threat has now re-emerged, calling Batman back into action, one last time…”Crime Alley” is an independent, non-profit, fan film set in the comic book universe of Batman. Non-profit fan film.
title: Crime Alley
